name: Booki
desc: Creation of an home page in HTML & CSS
details: The problem I encounter with this web project is to create a responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes and to follow a provided design model to ensure consistency across all devices.

name: Sophie Bluel
desc: Creating a dynamic website with JavaScript
details: The problem I encounter with this web project is to create a dynamic website using JavaScript and fetch API to retrieve data from an external source and display it on the site in real-time.

name: Nina Carducci
desc: Debugging and optimizing a photographer's site
details: The problem I encounter with this web project is to optimize and debug an existing website, as well as to implement improvements to enhance the site's SEO and increase its visibility in search engine rankings.

name: Kasa
desc: Creating a rental web application with react
details: The problem I encounter with this web project is to build a website using React and React Router to create a seamless and dynamic user experience with multiple pages and routes.

name: Mon vieux Grimoire
desc: Building the back-end of a book rating site
details: The problem I encounter with this web project is to create a backend server using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to handle data storage and retrieval, as well as to provide an API for a frontend client to interact with the database.
